title: Oru Kuppai Kathai
production companies: Sri Narayanan S3 Ventures Pvt Ltd
plot: A brokenhearted trash collector tries to win back his wife.
synopsis: Kuppai Kathai 2018 Tamil Movie Story is about Kumar works as a waste collector for Chennai company. Kumar also has a problem in finding a bride to marry due to his tedious work. However, he later finds a bride whose name is Poongudi and marries with her. However, Poongudi after marriage hates the slum life with her husband and returns to her home. After a baby being born, Kumar takes back Poongudi to his home. And Poongudi made a decision which will alter the way of her life. The effects of her decision and what she and husband face in the story.Kuppai Kathai 2018 Tamil Movie Story is about Kumar works as a waste collector for Chennai company.
